channel.title: CiTR -- Mantra
channel.description: Kirtan, Mantra, Chanting and Culture. There's no place like Om. Hosted by Raghunath with special guests.
channel.itunes:summary: Kirtan, Mantra, Chanting and Culture. There's no place like Om. Hosted by Raghunath with special guests.
channel.itunes:author: CiTR 101.9 Vancouver
channel.itunes:subtitle: Kirtan, Mantra, Chanting and Culture. There's no place like Om. Hosted by Raghunath with special guests.

item.title: Mantra Radio - November 1st 2014
item.itunes:subtitle: An eclectic mix of beats, layers, chants, and medicine song. Music from Silvia Nakkach, Desert Dwellers w/ Chaos Control, Funk Lab, Sheila Chandra, I Awake, Ainu Tribes, Shinjuku Thief, Kalya Scintilla, Culturalove, David Starfire w/ Govinda, and Muridae.

item.title: Mantra Radio - October 25th 2014
item.itunes:subtitle: An eclectic mix of beats, layers, chants, and medicine song. Music from Drumspyder, Master Minded, Androcell, Sheila Chandra, Maga Bo, Merkaba, and Shaman's Dream.

item.title: Mantra Radio - October 18th 2014
item.itunes:subtitle: An eclectic mix of beats, layers, chants, and medicine song. Music from Beatfarmer, Dub Trees, Men of Bathurst Is., Master Minded, Akasha, Ainu Tribe, Land Switcher, Monks of Stift Heiligenkreuz, Pakl Palmieri, Gabriele Carasco, Warp Technique, and Enuui.

item.title: Mantra Radio - October 4th 2014
item.itunes:subtitle: An eclectic mix of beats, layers, chants, and medicine song. Music from Land Switcher, Frequenze Vibrazionali, Jai Uttal, Shamanic Orchestra, Lars Leonhard, Kaya Project, Akasha, Mosavo, Zeb, Davide Cali, dj Slater, and Kaminanda.

item.title: Mantra Radio - September 27th 2014
item.itunes:subtitle: An eclectic mix of beats, layers, chants, and medicine song. Music from Craig Pruess & Ananda, Yechidah, Kalya Scintilla, Brujo's Bowl, Desert Dwellers, Deep Forest Warrior, Vieux Farka Tour√©, Sacred Spirit, Zeb, Eccodek, and Globular.

item.title: Mantra Radio - September 13th 2014

item.title: Mantra Radio - August 30th 2014
